title: unlocking sun x-ray
content: 6 min read marshall grazing incidence x-ray spectrometer ( magixs ) nasa developed new type instrument provide key information predict understand solar flare . x-ray spectroscopy provides unique capability answering fundamental question solar physic predicting onset energetic event like solar flare coronal mass ejection , impact life earth . nasa marshall space flight center partner developing new instrumentation make observing sun x-ray reality . soft x-ray wavelength range dominated spectral line formed ion exist temperature -20 million degree . observing spectral line yield insight basic physical process sun star not easily accessible mean . nasa built marshall grazing incidence x-ray spectrometer ( magixs ) sounding rocket instrument acquire first-ever high-resolution spectrally spatially resolved x-ray observation solar atmosphere soft x-ray wavelength range . launched july , , magixs instrument consists three grazing incidence mirror , diffraction grating , low noise detector . over decade technology development funded nasa heliophysics technology instrument development science ( h-tides ) heliophysics low cost access space ( h-lcas ) program required make magixs flight success . instrument using grazing incidence mirror , light skim mirror surface , like rock skipping across pond . type mirror produce x-ray image , mirror difficult fabricate . magixs mirror fabricated msfc using new replication process nasa developed includes unique customized measurement , data analysis , machine programing tool . first step process super polish mandrel ( accurate mold ) act basis mirror . magixs served pathfinder deterministic , computer numerical control ( cnc ) polishing process specifically tailored correct error shape mandrel result high-resolution grazing-incidence mirror mandrel . deterministic process utilizes polishing machine guided metrological feedback provide precise polishing control . after mandrel polished , mirror shell electroformed onto mandrel . mirror shell separated mandrel via differential thermal expansion ( i.e . , mandrel shell placed chilled water bath , due different rate expansion material used fabricate mandrel mirror , two piece separate ) . magixs demonstrated deterministic polishing technique significantly reduced figure error mandrel produced mirror desired characteristic . another key element magixs instrument diffraction grating , spread incoming x-ray light component wavelength . diffraction grating used century spectroscopy related technology constantly improved . magixs team developed advanced technique push boundary technology even farther instance employ spacing between grating element fraction wavelength visible light . magixs us blazed grating , meaning grating surface resembles sawtooth pattern angle surface precisely manufactured produce maximum efficiency amount light sent focal plane detector . main challenge involved developing type grating ensure between step pattern increase along length grating improve resolution resulting spectrum focal plane . magixs optical system includes three mirror , grating , detector must aligned . positional tolerance optic system very tight extremely narrow aperture must lined up precisely . alignment optic ground prior flight also complicated fact optic operate x-ray , not pas through atmosphere . overcome challenge , magixs team used alignment tool previously developed nasa chandra x-ray observatory developed new technique allowed different optical component aligned using theodolite . another difficulty developing instrument sounding rocket need employ low-noise , low-cost camera system survive rocket launch . magixs camera slightly modified version four-channel readout charged-coupled device ( ccd ) camera developed msfc another sounding rocket instrument . camera utilizes teledyne e2v technology back-illuminated ccd mechanically masked expose 1k 2k pixel us remaining 1k 2k pixel title: nasa ezie launching study magnetic fingerprint earth aurora
content: high above earth pole , intense electrical current called electrojets flow through upper atmosphere when aurora glow sky . auroral electrojets push million amp electrical charge around pole every second . create largest magnetic disturbance ground , rapid change current lead effect power outage . march , nasa plan launch ezie ( electrojet zeeman imaging explorer ) mission learn more powerful current , hope ultimately mitigating effect space weather human earth . result ezie help nasa better understand dynamic earth-sun connection help improve prediction hazardous space weather harm astronaut , interfere satellite , trigger power outage . ezie mission includes three cubesats , size carry-on suitcase . small satellite fly pearls-on-a-string formation , following orbit earth pole pole 350 mile ( 550 kilometer ) overhead . spacecraft look down toward electrojets , flow 60 mile ( 100 kilometer ) above ground electrified layer earth atmosphere called ionosphere . during every orbit , ezie spacecraft map electrojets uncover structure evolution . spacecraft fly over region 2 10 minute apart one another , revealing how electrojets change . view video please enable javascript , consider upgrading web browser support html5 video previous ground-based experiment spacecraft observed auroral electrojets , small part vast electric circuit extends ,000 mile ( ,000 kilometer ) earth space . decade , scientist debated overall system look like how evolves . mission team expects ezie resolve debate . ezie unique , said larry kepko , ezie mission scientist nasa goddard space flight center greenbelt , maryland . ezie first mission dedicated exclusively studying electrojets , completely new measurement technique . larry kepko ezie mission scientist , nasa goddard space flight center technique involves looking microwave emission oxygen molecule 10 mile ( 16 kilometer ) below electrojets . normally , oxygen molecule emit microwave frequency 118 gigahertz . however , electrojets create magnetic field split apart 118 gigahertz emission line process called zeeman splitting . stronger magnetic field , farther apart line split . three ezie spacecraft carry instrument called microwave electrojet magnetogram observe zeeman effect measure strength direction electrojets magnetic field . built nasa jet propulsion laboratory ( jpl ) southern california , instrument use four antenna pointed different angle survey magnetic field along four different track ezie orbit . technology used microwave electrojet magnetograms originally developed study earth atmosphere weather system . engineer jpl reduced size radio detector could fit small satellite , including nasa tempest-d cuberrt mission , improved component separate light specific wavelength . view video please enable javascript , consider upgrading web browser support html5 video electrojets flow through region difficult study directly , high scientific balloon reach low satellite dwell . utilization zeeman technique remotely map current-induced magnetic field really game-changing approach get measurement altitude notoriously difficult measure , said sam yee , ezie principal investigator john hopkins applied physic laboratory ( apl ) laurel , maryland . mission also including citizen scientist enhance research , distributing dozen ezie-mag magnetometer kit student u.s. volunteer around world compare ezie observation earth . ezie scientist collecting magnetic field data above , student collecting magnetic field data ground , said nelli mosavi-hoyer , ezie project manager apl . nelli mosavi-hoyer ezie project manager , john hopkins applied physic laboratory ezie spacecraft launch aboard spacex falcon 9 rocket vandenberg space force base california part transporter-13 rideshare mission spacex via launch integrator maverick space system . mission launch during known solar maximum phase during -year solar cycle when sun activity stronger more frequent . advantage ezie science . better launch during solar max , kepko said . electrojets respond directly solar activity . ezie mission also work alongside nasa heliophysics mission , including punch ( polarimeter unify corona heliosphere ) , launching late february study how material sun outer atmosphere becomes solar wind . according yee , ezie cubesat mission not allows scientist address compelling question not able answer decade also demonstrates great science achieved cost-effectively . leveraging new capability cubesats , kepko added . mission flown decade ago . pushing envelope possible , small satellite . exciting think discover . ezie mission funded heliophysics division within nasa science mission directorate managed explorer program office nasa goddard . apl lead mission nasa . blue canyon technology boulder , colorado , built cubesats . vanessa thomasnasa goddard space flight center , greenbelt , md . header image : artist 's concept show three ezie satellite orbiting earth.credits : nasa/johns hopkins apl/steve gribben 13th straight year , nasa earned title best place work nasa latest space observatory targeting march 8 liftoff , agency punch heliophysics
